About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

A proactive and fast learning individual seeking an opportunity to work as a data analyst and machine learning engineer to help the company achieve business goals while sticking to vision, mission and values.
I am the Technical Secretary of Electronic Student Association(ESA) at SPIT.
I was also semi-finaist at Texas Instruments Innovative Challenge(IICDC)

Machine Learning Engineer

Neural Network Expertise

I have key expertise in machine Learning and also made Several Projects on Neural Network. I would love to design algorithms and programs to help company in its day to day work.

Website Developer

Front End Developer

I have expertise in website development with HTMl,CSS and JAVAScript.This very website is also design by me.
I would love to work with experts and also give my input as Website Developer.

Data Analysts

Data Visualization

I have key expertise in Pandas,Numpy and Python Programming.I also know about Data Visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn
I am also learning Machine Learning with python.I would love to work if given opportunity in this field.
